BarWidth.title: Bar Width
BarWidth.description: The width of the window in pixels

BarHeightWhenClosed.title: Bar Height
BarHeightWhenClosed.description: The height of the bar while the window is not open

WindowPositionFromLeft.title: Horizontal Window Position
WindowPositionFromLeft.description: The distance from left of the screen to left of the window

WindowOpenDelay.title: Window Delay
WindowOpenDelay.description: The duration after the pointer enter the window

IsWindowCentered.title: Keep The Window Centered
IsWindowCentered.description: The window will be on the center of the screen

ImageCountPerRequest.title: Count Of The Images Per Request
ImageCountPerRequest.description: The number of images that the 'Load More' button on the images tab will load

RememberDownloadLocation.title: Ask Download Location
RememberDownloadLocation.description: Download the files into the path below, without asking where to download them

NotificationDuration.title: Heads-Up Duration
NotificationDuration.description: The duration of the Heads-Up notifications in milliseconds

TransitionDuration.title: Animation Duration
TransitionDuration.description: The duration of the animations in milliseconds

--sz-border-radius.title: Border Radius
--sz-border-radius.description: Round level of the box borders
